info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 7:57PM EDT by NWS Miami FL
info.description:
At 757 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lion Country Safari Park, or near Wellington, moving east at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 50 mph and half inch hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible.
Locations impacted include... Boynton Beach, Ocean Ridge, Lakeside Green, Palm Beach International Airport, Aberdeen, Greenacres, Port Of Palm Beach, Village Of Golf, Glen Ridge, Plantation Mobile Home Park, Golden Lakes, Aberdeen Golf Course, Mangonia Park, Loxahatchee Groves, Gun Club Estates, Seminole Manor, Briny Breezes, Wellington, Riviera Beach, and Palm Beach.
info.instruction:
These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

parameter.value: A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Palm Beach County through 845 PM EDT

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County; Coastal Palm Beach County
